name: Small Roid Big City (Skill Card)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
At the start of the Duel, place this card in your Field Zone and flip it over.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up card you control; destroy it, and if you do, add 1 "roid" card from your Deck to your hand.
Once per turn, when an attack is declared involving an opponent's monster and a "roid" monster you control: You can send 1 "roid" monster from your Deck to the GY; switch the original ATK and DEF of your battling monster during the damage calculation only.
